Job Description: 3- 4 years of applicable work experience. 2+ years' experience with Microsoft .Net Web application,  SQL Server,  ASP.Net and Visual Studio development environment. Experience designing and writing bespoke applications using Visual Studio. Experience in Java Script,  JQuery,  MVC,  HTML,  JSON,  XML,  AJAX and XSLT, SQL Procedures and Triggers. Experience in Mobile development in Android technology will be an advantage. Well versed with SVN.
